mapper.sql: a.id, a.college_id AS "college.id", a.section, a.year, a.highest, a.lowest, a.average, a.batch, a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.ext1, a.ext2, a.ext3, c.name AS "college.name"
LEFT JOIN tb_basic_college c ON a.college_id = c.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_college_historical_line( id, college_id, profession, type, section, year, highest, lowest, average, batch, create_date, update_date, del_flag, ext1, ext2, ext3 ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{college.id}, #{profession}, #{type}, #{section}, #{year}, #{highest}, #{lowest}, #{average}, #{batch}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{ext1}, #{ext2}, #{ext3} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_college_historical_line SET college_id = #{college.id}, section = #{section}, year = #{year}, highest = #{highest}, lowest = #{lowest}, average = #{average}, batch = #{batch}, update_date = #{updateDate}, ext1, ext2, ext3 WHERE id = #{id}
